```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr) 
library(kableExtra) 
library(formattable)
library(dplyr)
library(utils)
library(erarr)
options(scipen = 999)


erisk_item <- utils::read.csv("../data/RISKLIST_FULL.csv")
risk_item_db<-data.frame(erisk_item)
erisk_project <- utils::read.csv("../data/PROJECTLIST_FULL.csv")
risk_project_db<-data.frame(erisk_project)

risk_item_db<-risk_item_db |>
  dplyr::left_join(risk_project_db|>
              dplyr::select(PROJECT_ID, PRIMARYMISSION))

RiskDeets <- risk_item_db |>
  dplyr::select("PROJECT_ID","P2_NUMBER","RISK_IDENTIFIER", "PROJECT_NAME","RISK_NAME","RISKCATEGORY","RISK_STATEMENT" ,"LIFECYCLEPHASENAME","MILESTONE","LIKELIHOOD","DISCIPLINE", "PERFORMANCEIMPACT", "PERFORMANCE_RANK_DESC", "PERFORMANCEIMPACT_RISK_RANKING","COST_IMPACT_MOSTLIKELY", "COST_RANK_DESC","COST_RISK_RANKING", "SCHEDULE_IMPACT_MOSTLIKELY", "SCHEDULE_RANK_DESC", "SCHEDULE_RISK_RANKING", "PRIMARYMISSION", "USACE_ORGANIZATION")

```



```{r echo=FALSE, eval = params$projID != ""}
Risk_List_Proj <-dplyr::filter(RiskDeets, RiskDeets$PROJECT_NAME == params$projID | RiskDeets$P2_NUMBER == params$p2ID)
Risk_List_Proj$COST_IMPACT_MOSTLIKELY <- as.character(formattable::currency(Risk_List_Proj$COST_IMPACT_MOSTLIKELY))

proj_risks<-dplyr::filter(Risk_List_Proj, Risk_List_Proj$PROJECT_NAME == params$projID)
proj_risk_item<- dplyr::slice_head(Risk_List_Proj)

```

```{r echo=FALSE, eval = params$p2ID != ""}
Risk_List_Proj <-dplyr::filter(RiskDeets, RiskDeets$P2_NUMBER == params$p2ID)
Risk_List_Proj$COST_IMPACT_MOSTLIKELY <- as.character(formattable::currency(Risk_List_Proj$COST_IMPACT_MOSTLIKELY))

proj_risks<-dplyr::filter(Risk_List_Proj, Risk_List_Proj$P2_NUMBER == params$p2ID)
proj_risk_item<- dplyr::slice_head(Risk_List_Proj)
```

```{r proj risk pies, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center',fig.height=2, fig.width=7}
#make pie plots 
  cost_pie<- erarr::pieprep(proj_risks, "COST_RANK_DESC")
  schedule_pie<-erarr::pieprep(proj_risks, "SCHEDULE_RANK_DESC")
  perform_pie<- erarr::pieprep(proj_risks, "PERFORMANCE_RANK_DESC")

```

#### Top 3 Cost Impacts (All Phases)
``` {r cost risk log, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
cost_log_table<-proj_risks |>
  dplyr::select(RISK_IDENTIFIER, RISK_NAME, RISKCATEGORY , MILESTONE , LIKELIHOOD, COST_IMPACT_MOSTLIKELY) |>
  dplyr::slice_max(COST_IMPACT_MOSTLIKELY, n=4)|>
  kableExtra::kbl(format = "html", escape = F, col.names =c("Risk ID","Risk Name","Risk Category","Project Milestone","Likelihood", "Cost Impact"), align="clcccc", row.names = FALSE)|>
  kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c( "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))

cost_log_table
```

#### Top 3 Schedule Impacts (All Phases)

#### Top 3 Performance Impacts (All Phases)
``` {r perform risk log, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
perform_log_table<-proj_risks |>
  dplyr::select(RISK_IDENTIFIER, RISK_NAME, RISKCATEGORY , MILESTONE , LIKELIHOOD, PERFORMANCE_RANK_DESC) |>
  dplyr::arrange(factor(PERFORMANCE_RANK_DESC, levels = c ("High","Medium","Low","Opportunity"))) |>

  kableExtra::kbl(format = "html", escape = F, col.names =c("Risk ID","Risk Name","Risk Category","Project Milestone","Likelihood", "Performance Impact"), align="clcccc", row.names = FALSE)|>
```
